speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, at 4:30 p.m. the Senate will proceed to vote on the motion to invoke cloture on the Rockefeller-Bond substitute amendment. If cloture is not invoked on the substitute, a second vote would then occur on the motion to invoke cloture on the Reid amendment. As a reminder, the filing deadline for second-degree amendments is 4 p.m. on Monday.
As a reminder, at 9 p.m. Monday, the President will address a joint session of Congress to present his State of the Union Address.
